General.Name: Linkage Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Linkage Software Co., LTD operates as a financial software company. Its products include cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, mobile terminals, and internet application. It also offers its software solution in the field of intelligent operation marketing services for O2O customers, wealth management, digital transformation solution for large investment banks, integrated financial services for institutional services, asset management, microservice cloud management, credit cloud, client, and tool architect; and offers software development services and domestic application software solution. Linkage Software Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou, China.
